ygData.messageBody:
there was a long letter compiled by i believe Elwyn on one of the onelist
bards lists, not sure if this one. it started from Elwyn, then everyone on
the list gave input, and it was revised 2 or 3 times and sent in. we got a
response about a month later. i used the word petition, but it was more
simply a letter. i think if we were to have a follow-up letter, the skill
caps should be included. if we were to add parry as a skill we desire, we
should also note we do not expect it to cap anywhere near what other melee
classes get, but more along the lines of our dodge skill (125 i believe).
also, perhaps GZ can finally put to rest the jig/mana recovery issue. if he
says it's bogus, that is something we can really use for the naysayers.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L30 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


> Regarding the petition - I had thought Shada said there was a
> petition with
> skill capping as one of the items to fix. I was corrected. I
> know there have
> been petitions and letters sent to GZ and such, but I haven't really
> participated in any of them as of yet. Normally I just
> feedback any opinions
> i have on the game, but even as a write one I feel like I'm
> wasting my time.
> If anyone has a current petition why don't you add the skill
> cap and ask
> parry to be added to bards on it. =)
>
> Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
> Bard of Kelethin of the 50th Chorus
> Veeshan
